snippet.title: So Let Us Melt - a science fiction fairy-tale for Daydream VR
snippet.description:
Welcome to Kenopsia! Our new game - So Let Us Melt - is out this Thursday on Daydream. Follow the adventures of Custodian 98 on his epic adventure that spans over ten million years.

From the award-winning studio that created Dear Esther and Everybody's Gone to the Rapture
